text: Hello
hello
We're talking so that I can ask you to donate a portion of your payment to Save The Children
What does Save the Children do?
It helps children in Indonesia that are in homemade camps and earthquake stricken areas.
That sounds like a good charity. How much of the charity donation goes directly to helping them?
9 out of every 10 dollars... a good percentage for a charity organization
What kind of services do they offer to the children? Do they have staff or volunteers that go over to help directly, or do they just send supplies?

They have their own aid workers for certain projects, and other projects are about supplies.  They have aid workers that help in disaster, but they also send food baskets to kids in war zones.  There are several different relief programs their money goes to.
I would be willing to donate 1 dollar

That's excellent.  Your donation will be pulled directly from your task payment.  The research team is sending all the donations directly to Save The Children.  Do you have any other questions since we have to do 10 messages each for the task?
I do not have any more questions
Cool.  Thank you for donating a dollar.  I like supporting children's charities, and I like when other people do.  How much mturking have you done today?
I've just started for the day so I've only done 1 other task so far. How about you?
This is 3rd task for the day.  I haven't been on long either.  I've only been doing this about a month.  You?
A little over a month. I just hit 500 a couple of days ago.
Nice.  I had a 1c hit that you could do a lot of times, so I used it to boost my numbers.  I'm a little over 1000.  I'm doing $5-10 a day roughy.
Same here. I usually try to keep my tasks at 50c and above. I'm paranoid about doing a lot of small hits and getting hundreds of rejections lol

I use HitForker (look it up).  I set my tasks for 50c or higher and pluck them from there to go into my Panda thing.  There's a ton of browser extensions and sites to help.  Facebook groups too.  Thank you for donating $1 to this.  When you send your 10th message, I'm sure it will give you the option to do that. :)
I use HITscraper. Nice talking to you.
